<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
  <groupId>de.aikiit</groupId>
  <artifactId>spamschutz</artifactId>
  <name>SpamSchutz - simple way to protect your mail adresses from naïve spammers</name>
  <version>1.0.5-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <description>This spamschutz (=spam protector in German) can be launched as
        an applet or a standalone application. It converts all given characters
        to their ASCII representation, thus making it hard for regular
        expressions to find mail adresses.</description>
  <url>https://github.com/ottlinger/spamschutz/</url>
  <issueManagement>
    <system>GitHub issues</system>
    <url>https://github.com/ottlinger/spamschutz/issues</url>
  </issueManagement>
  <developers>

      <name>Hugo Hirsch</name>
    </developer>
  </developers>

  </licenses>
